original: FELLENIUS, Wolmar Knut Axel, Professor em, överstelöjtn, Stockholm, f Salem, Sthlms l, 10/9 76 av major A R W F o Eveline Kuhlau, gm Emy Janse. Mog.ex NReal Sthlm 94, KTH (V o V) 94—98. Milit.kurs f intr i VVK 98, ljt VVK 04, kapt 13, major 20, öv.löjtn 30. Avd.ing v statsban Gällivare—Riksgränsen 99, l:e bitr ing v Norrkps stads byggn.kont 99—03, arb.ch o stadsbyggmäst i Hsand 03—05, avd.ch v Gbgs hamnstyr :s nybyggn.avd 05—11, lär i väg- o vattenbyggn.konst CTL 06—11, prof i vattenbyggn.lära KTH 11-42. Krigstjg 14, 39, 40 o fr 41. Upprätt förslag t hamnbyggn f Gbg, Västerås, Falkenb, Kristineh, Jönköping, Södertälje, Oskarshamn, Örnsköldsvik, Halmst, Hälsingborg, Gävle, Varberg, Lkrona, Trondheim, Oslo mfl samt bitr v fi av dessa förslags utför; projekt o övervak utför av pontonbro öv Tranebergssund (tills m prof O Linton 13), verkst utredn ang flytbro öv L:a Värtan (tills m d:o). Led av kommiss f statsban Rönninge—Ström 11, av SJ:s geotekn kommiss, ds ordf 19—22 o ordf i ds arb.utsk 14—22. Förest KTH :s avd f väg- o vatten-byggn.konst 15—28 o 39—42, ordf KTH:s bibl.-nmd 33—42. Sekr Sv Kommunaltekn Frn 08 —12, hed.led där 33, hed.borg v tekn högsk Karlsruhe 21, korresp led av Norsk Ingeni0rs-forening 24, Dr-ing h c tekn högsk Darmstadt 36, styr.led Sv Tekn.frn 23—25, 28—29 o 31— 36, ordf i dess avd f tekn underv 23—25 o 33 —36, f väg- o vattenb.konst 26—27, ordf i Johannesavd av Sthlms Fastigh.ägarefrn sed. 35, v. ordf i dna frns fullmakt sed. 37, led av hyresnmdn f Sthlms 5:e distr sed. 42, studieråd v Tekn Inst Sthlm sed. 16, ordf i Frn 1876 års män sed. 31. Av trycket: Fiskhamnar vid o i närheten av Nordsjön (07), Frihamnar i Europa, Om beräkn av kaj-byggn o dyl (10), Nybyggn i Gbgs hamn (12), Hamnväs :s utveckling i Sv under den sen 50-årsperioden (12), Försl t frihamn i ’Gbg (15), Utredn av erosionsrisker gm partiell regl av Siljan (tills m L von Post 22), Ekon beräkn av pumpledningar (13), Vatten-byggn.lab v KTH (19, 22, 26, 29), Vågerosions-försök (21), Jordstat beräkn etc (26, 29, övers t tyska), Tryckförluster i skyddsgrindar (27), Utredn betr avbördn.förhåll v regl.dammen v Vargön (tills m E Lindquist 33), Ekon probl inom vattenbyggn.tekn (43). KVO2kl, RNO, KDDO2gr, RNSrtOOlkl.
translated: FELLENIUS, Wolmar Knut Axel, Professor Emeritus, Lieutenant Colonel, Stockholm, from Salem, Sthlm l, 10/9 1876, son of Major A R W F and Eveline Kuhlau, married to Emy Janse. Graduated from NReal Sthlm 1894, KTH (V o V) 1894-1898. Military course for entry into the VVK 1898, Lieutenant in the VVK 1904, Captain 1913, Major 1920, Lieutenant Colonel 1930. Department engineer for the Gällivare-Riksgränsen railway 1899, first assistant engineer for the Norrköping city building department 1899-1903, chief architect and city building master in Helsingborg 1903-1905, department head of the Gothenburg Port Authority's new construction department 1905-1911, teacher in road and water construction at CTL 1906-1911, professor of hydraulic engineering at KTH 1911-1942. War service in 1914, 1939, 1940 and 1941. Developed proposals for harbor construction in Gothenburg, Västerås, Falkenberg, Kristinehamn, Jönköping, Södertälje, Oskarshamn, Örnsköldsvik, Halmstad, Helsingborg, Gävle, Varberg, Karlshamn, Trondheim, Oslo, and others, as well as assisted in the execution of these proposals; implemented and supervised the construction of a pontoon bridge over Tranebergssund (in collaboration with Professor O Linton in 1913), conducted a study on a floating bridge over Lilla Värtan (in collaboration with the aforementioned). Member of the commission for the Rönninge-Ström railway, member of the SJ geotechnical commission, deputy chairman 1919-1922, chairman of the working committee 1914-1922. Head of the Department of Road and Water Construction at KTH 1915-1928 and 1939-1942, chairman of the KTH library committee 1933-1942. Secretary of the Swedish Municipal Technical Association 1908-1912, honorary member since 1933, honorary citizen of the Technical University of Karlsruhe 1921, corresponding member of the Norwegian Society of Engineers 1924, Doctor of Engineering, honoris causa from the Technical University of Darmstadt 1936, member of the board of the Swedish Technical Association 1923-1925, 1928-1929, and 1931-1936, chairman of its department of technical education 1923-1925 and 1933-1936, department of road and water construction 1926-1927, chairman of the Johannes department of the Stockholm Property Owners Association since 1935, vice chairman of the DNA delegate since 1937, member of the rental board for the 5th district of Stockholm since 1942, member of the study council at the Technical Institute Stockholm since 1916, chairman of the Frn 1876 men's association since 1931. Publications: Fish harbors at and near the North Sea (1907), Free ports in Europe, Calculation of quay construction, etc. (1910), New construction in Gothenburg harbor (1912), Development of port facilities in Sweden over the past 50 years (1912), Proposal for a free port in Gothenburg (1915), Study on erosion risks through partial regulation of Siljan (in collaboration with L von Post in 1922), Economic calculations of pump conduits (1913), Hydraulic engineering laboratory at KTH (1919, 1922, 1926, 1929), Wave erosion experiments (1921), Calculation of soil properties, etc. (1926, 1929, translation into German), Pressure losses in protective gates (1927), Study on discharge conditions in the Vargön regulation dam (in collaboration with E Lindquist in 1933), Economic problems in water engineering (1943). Commander of the Royal Order of Vasa, Knight of the North Star Order, Commander of the Royal Norwegian Order of St. Olav.
